page.title: 07DE LA POLE : ORGANISATION
page.content: In charge of the hospital is a divisional nursing officer.Under him the hospital is divided into several units, each run by a senior nurse. These units consist of 4 wards with a sister in charge. The nursing staff work a total of 75 hours a fortnight. In addition to basic nursing care the staff in the pyschiatric units provide group, drug and electro-compulsive therapy to treat the patient's disorders. The paramedic staff are chiefly concerned with the rehabilitation of patients.The physio ,occupational and remedial therapists provide a whole range of exercises and training courses in an attempt to prepare the patients for their eventual return to supervised houses or theie own homes and families.
